page.title: 01HALL GARTH
page.content: In Hall Garth there are 8 houses and 5 more are under construction. One of the houses has 12 chimneys and once it was a very big farm house with 100 acres of land. The people who lived in it, when it was built had 12 fire places and that is why it has 12 chimneys . A lot of people say that it is haunted by the lady that lived in it when it was built. A long time ago a young man fell in love with a young lady and he asked her to marry him. But the lady's father was a very rich man and he said that he could not marry his daughter until he had built a house with 12 chimneys. So he did and the lady is said to have died in it and now she haunts it.
